net.title: 网络链接不可用
net.desc: 检查飞行模式是否已禁用，并且您已连接到本地网络

warn.title: 警告!
warn.desc:
USB installations may not "just werk" on some devices and setups.
If you experience issues with USB installations, please don't pull your
hair out! It's advised to use NS-USBloader for USB installations, or
LAN/Internet installations instead for remote installation, especially
when paired with an ethernet adapter!

You have been warned...

applet.title: 不支持该模式
applet.desc:
You may experience issues using Tinleaf Installer in Applet Mode. If you do
have problems, please switch to running Tinleaf Installer over an installed
title (hold R while starting a game)!

help.title: 帮助
help.desc:
Files can be installed remotely from your other devices using tools such
as NS-USBloader in Tinfoil mode. To send files to your Switch, open one
of these pieces of software on your PC or mobile device, input your
Switch's IP address (listed on-screen), select your files, then upload
to your console! If the software you're using won't let you select
specific file types, try renaming the extension to something it accepts.
Tinleaf Installer doesn't care about file extensions during net installations!

If you can't figure it out, just copy your files to your SD card and try
the "Install from SD Card" option on the main menu!

url.hint: Enter the Internet address of a file

gdrive.hint: 输入Google Drive 文件 ID

net.top_info: Select what files you want to install from the server, then press the Plus button!

浏览并选择要安装的文件，然后按加号按钮.

hdd.source_string: 通过 USB 硬盘安装

help.title: 帮助
help.desc:
Files can be installed over USB from other devices using tools such as
NS-USBloader in Tinfoil mode. To send files to your Switch, open one of
these pieces of software on your PC, select your files, then upload to
your console!

Unfortunately USB installations require a specific setup on some
platforms, and can be rather buggy at times. If you can't figure it out,
give LAN/internet installs a try, or copy your files to your SD card and
try the "Install from SD Card" option on the main menu!

usb.top_info: USB连接成功！正在等待要发送的文件列表...
usb.top_info2: 选择要通过USB安装的文件，然后按加号按钮!

info_page.failed_desc: 可以从系统设置小程序中删除部分安装的内容.

nca_verify.title: 检测到无效的NCA签名!
nca_verify.desc:
Improperly signed software should only be installed from trustworthy
sources. Files containing cartridge repacks and DLC unlockers will always
show this warning. You can disable this check in Tinleaf Installer's settings.

Are you sure you want to continue the installation?

finished: 尽情享受你的 "合法备份"!
我相信在你尝试过这个游戏之后，你会从中得到很多乐趣!
你买游戏对吧？任天堂谢谢你的购买!
绕过DRM感觉棒棒的，不是吗?
你不买游戏可能省了六棵树！所有的塑料都到哪里去了！
任天堂忍者已经被派往你现在的位置.
我们甚至不需要把一个意识形态塞进你的喉咙就可以到达这里!

is trustworthy!
